an7.34:1.1: “Imam, bhikkhave, rattim annatara devata …pe… mam etadavoca:
an7.34:1.4: Satthugaravata, dhammagaravata, sanghagaravata, sikkhagaravata, samadhigaravata, sovacassata, kalyanamittata.
an7.34:1.5: Ime kho, bhante, satta dhamma bhikkhuno aparihanaya samvattanti’ti.
an7.34:1.7: Idam vatva mam abhivadetva padakkhinam katva tatthevantaradhayiti.
